second_translate: By the way,
label: by the way,

hangle: 차라리 어둠의 존재 자체를 없앨 방법은 없는 건가요?
first_translate: is there a way to get rid of the darkness itself?
second_translate: Is there a way to erase the very existence of darkness instead?
label: is there a way to get rid of the darkness completely?

hangle: 오, 클로비스 후작님과 똑같은 말씀을 하시는군요.
first_translate: oh, you sound just like marquess clovis.
second_translate: Oh, you sound just like Marquess Clovis.
label: oh, you sound just like marquess clovis.

second_translate: Do you know the marquis?
label: do you know the marquess?

second_translate: This hill is steep.
label: this hill is so steep!

second_translate: Of course.
label: of course.

hangle: 아카데미에 가장 많은 연구비를 후원해 주시는 분이죠.
first_translate: he’s the one who funds the most research at the academy.
second_translate: He’s the one who provides the most research funding at the academy.
label: he's the academy's most generous research donor.

first_translate: he’s someone who understands the importance of research.
second_translate: He is someone who recognizes the importance of research.
label: he's one of the few who understand the importance of research.

second_translate: We’re very grateful.
label: we are truly grateful for his patronage.

second_translate: And...
label: and...

first_translate: ...even without that, he’s a very wonderful person.
second_translate: Even aside from that, he’s truly admirable~
label: ...even if you put his donations aside, he is quite a remarkable young man.

second_translate: Yeah...
label: I see...

second_translate: He has a good image.
label: he has a pretty good image.

second_translate: Anyway,
label: anyway,

first_translate: I didn’t know he was making his own efforts.
second_translate: To think he had been making steady efforts on his own.
label: I didn't know he's been putting effort into this for so long.

hangle: 역시 아렌트는 의심스럽긴 해도 대단한 인물이긴 해.
first_translate: arendt is a suspicious man, but he’s still an impressive one.
second_translate: Arendt may be suspicious, but he is undeniably a remarkable figure.
label: as suspicious as he may be, arendt never fails to impress.

second_translate: Actually,
label: to tell you the truth,

hangle: 저희도 어둠을 없애는 걸 목표로 연구를 진행 중 입니다만…
first_translate: we’re also conducting research to get rid of the darkness,
second_translate: We’re also conducting research with the goal of eliminating the darkness…
label: we’ve been focusing our research on getting rid of the darkness for good,

first_translate: but we haven’t made much progress.
second_translate: But we haven’t made much progress.
label: but we've had very little success.

first_translate: we did find out that magic, darkness, and the saint’s divine powers...
second_translate: We did find out that magic, darkness, and the divine power possessed by the saint...
label: we did learn that magical powers, the darkness, and the divine powers you possess...

hangle: 전부 유기적인 관계가 있다는 걸 알아내기는 했지만요.
second_translate: We've discovered that they are all organically connected.
label: ...all share a symbiotic relationship.

first_translate: divine power is the opposite of magic,
second_translate: Divine power is completely opposite to magic.
label: divine powers are completely at odds with magical powers.

hangle: 그리고 마력은 근본적으로 어둠과 유사한 성질.
first_translate: and magic is similar to darkness.
second_translate: And fundamentally, magic has properties similar to darkness.
label: and magical powers have a quality that is fundamentally the same as the darkness...

hangle: 또한 마력과 마력석은 서로 상호작용을 하죠.
first_translate: magic and magic stones also interact with each other.
second_translate: magic and magic stones also interact with each other.
label: ...while magical powers and magic stones interact well with each other.

hangle: 그러니 그쪽을 연구하면 뭔가 답이 나올지도 몰라요.
first_translate: so if you research that, you might find an answer.
second_translate: So if you research that, you might find an answer.
label: so with continued research, you may be able to find your answer.

second_translate: …You are quite knowledgeable.
label: you seem quite knowledgeable on the subject...

hangle: 관심 분야가 비슷한 분을 만나게 되어 기뻐요.
first_translate: I’m glad to meet someone with similar interests.
second_translate: I'm glad to meet someone with a similar field of interest.
label: I'm glad to meet someone with the same interest.

first_translate: my name is jane. please call me by my name.
second_translate: My name is Jane. Please feel free to call me Jane.
label: my name is jane. I'm pleased to make your acquaintance.

second_translate: I'm Fiona Heylon.
label: I'm fiona heylon.

hangle: 헤일론은 마물의 습격이 잦아 자연히 이쪽에 관심이 생겼답니다. 잘 부탁드려요.
first_translate: we’re often attacked by demons in heylon, so I naturally became interested in this field. it’s nice to meet you.
second_translate: Heylon is frequently attacked by monsters, so I naturally took an interest in this field. I look forward to working with you.
label: I naturally developed an interest in the subject due to heylon being attacked by demonic beasts so frequently.

hangle: 헤일론 영애, 이걸 안 물을 수가 없는데요.
first_translate: lady fiona, I have to ask you this.
second_translate: Lady Heylon, I can't not ask this.
label: lady fiona, there's something I must ask.

hangle: 영애께서는 어둠이 최근에 활발해진 이유가 뭐라고 생각하시나요?
first_translate: why do you think the darkness has become more active recently?
second_translate: My lady, why do you think the darkness has become more active recently?
label: why do you think the darkness has been so active lately?

second_translate: Hmm...
label: um

second_translate: That's a difficult question.
label: that's a difficult question...

second_translate: I'm actually curious about that too...
label: to be honest, that's something I've been wondering about myself...

hangle: 이 세계의 사람들은 어둠을 자연재해와 비슷하게 생각한다.
first_translate: people in this world think of darkness as a natural disaster.
second_translate: People in this world think of darkness as something similar to a natural disaster.
label: people in this world think of the darkness as a kind of natural disaster.

hangle: 일 년에 한두 번 강한 태풍이 오면 일대가 엉망이 되어버리지만,
first_translate: strong typhoons come once or twice a year and destroy the area,
second_translate: When a strong typhoon hits once or twice a year, the entire area is devastated,
label: just like how certain regions come back to life after hurricanes devastate them once or twice a year,

hangle: 죽은 땅도 긴 시간이 지나면 어느 정도 회복된다.
first_translate: but the land recovers after a long time.
second_translate: Even barren land recovers to some extent over time.
label: the dead lands are also revived to some extent after a long time.

hangle: 하지만 최근 어둠의 등장이 잦아져 다들 위기의식을 느낀 거겠지.
first_translate: but the darkness has been appearing more often, so people are feeling a sense of crisis.
second_translate: But lately, the darkness has been appearing more frequently, making everyone feel a sense of crisis.
label: but people are feeling ill at ease because the darkness has been appearing more often lately.

hangle: 제인처럼 어둠이 기승을 부리는 이유가 궁금한 사람이 많을 거다.
first_translate: there are probably a lot of people like jane who are curious about why the darkness is becoming more active.
second_translate: There are probably many people like Jane who are curious about why the darkness is running rampant.
label: like jane, I'm sure many people are wondering why the darkness has been so active lately.

second_translate: Some people have said this.
label: some people have been saying...

hangle: 근래 어둠이 자주 나타나게 된 건
first_translate: ...that the darkness has been appearing more often...
second_translate: Recently, the darkness has been appearing more often.
label: ...that the darkness has been appearing more often...

second_translate: Surely
label: ...because...

second_translate: Because God is angry.
label: ...god is angry.

hangle: 듣자 하니 관련된 종교도 생겼다는 모양이에요.
first_translate: I heard that a religion related to this has also been created.
second_translate: I heard that a religion related to this has emerged.
label: they say there's even a religion that has formed from this notion.

second_translate: Even a religion?
label: a religion?

first_translate: your holiness, we’ve arrived at the northern part of the village.
second_translate: Your Holiness, this is the northern part of the village.
label: your holiness, we're  in the northern part of the village now.

hangle: 숲과 마을… 어느 쪽을 먼저 정화하는 게 좋을까요?
first_translate: should we purify the forest or the village first?
second_translate: Should we purify the forest or the village first?
label: between the forest and the village, which should we purify first?

second_translate: Hmm...
label: um...

first_translate: I think we should start with the forest.
second_translate: I knew the forest would be the better choice.
label: I think we should work on the forest first.

second_translate: God's wrath...
label: did I write about...

second_translate: And religion.
label: ...god's wrath...

second_translate: Did I write something like this?
label: ...and religion?

second_translate: these things...
label: have these things...

hangle: 정말로 신이 화가 난 탓에 일어난 걸까?
second_translate: Did this really happen because God is angry?
label: ...been happening because of the wrath of god?

second_translate: No,
label: no,

hangle: 애초에 신이란 건 있는지 없는지도 모르는걸.
first_translate: I don’t even know if god exists.
second_translate: I don’t even know if God exists.
label: god may not even exist to begin with.

second_translate: Then.
label: then...

second_translate: …If it’s not God's doing,
label: ...if this isn't an act of god,

first_translate: could it be the work of humans?
second_translate: Could it be the work of humans?
label: could this be the work of a human?

second_translate: I'm talking about you.
label: I'm onto you.

hangle: 조사 끝나고 돌아올 때는 무언가 복잡한 얼굴이었다가,
first_translate: you looked troubled when you came back from the investigation,
second_translate: When you came back from the investigation, you looked troubled.
label: you came back from the search looking like you had a lot on your mind,

first_translate: but when you saw me, you stared at me...
second_translate: But when you saw me, you stared at me for a while before...
label: but then you saw me and stared for a while...

second_translate: ...and then changed to that smirking expression.
label: ...and suddenly broke out into a smile.

second_translate: What’s up with you?
label: what's that about?

second_translate: Was I smiling?
label: was I smiling?

hangle: 똥개 중에서 가장 잘생긴 똥개라고 생각하니 그만.
first_translate: I was just thinking that you’re the best-looking among the mutts.
second_translate: I was just thinking that you're the best-looking among the mutts.
label: I couldn't help it because I thought you were the cutest mutt I'd ever seen.

second_translate: It’s nothing special.
label: it's nothing.

first_translate: do I have something on my face?
second_translate: Do I have something on my face?
label: do I have something on my face...?

second_translate: What are you laughing at?
label: what's he laughing at?

second_translate: I’m just amazed.
label: I'm just surprised.

hangle: 겨울의 수호자라길래, 처음에는 몸집이 태산만 한 사람일 거라 생각했거든…
first_translate: when I heard you were the guardian of winter, I thought you’d be as big as a mountain.
second_translate: When I heard you were the guardian of winter, I thought you’d be as big as a mountain.
label: when they said you're the winter guardian, I thought you'd be the size of a mountain...

second_translate: Sorry for being just an ordinary person.
label: I'm sorry, but I'm just a normal girl.

second_translate: You call that ordinary?
label: on the contrary,

first_translate: there’s no one as unique as you--
second_translate: There’s no one as unique as you--
label: you're the farthest from normal I've ever seen...

second_translate: My lady.
label: fiona,

hangle: 어둠이 같은 곳에 두 번 올 수도 있나?
first_translate: can the darkness come to the same place twice?
second_translate: Can the darkness come to the same place twice?
label: is it possible for the darkness to come to the same place twice?

second_translate: R-run away!
label: r-run!

second_translate: The darkness is coming!
label: the darkness is coming!

second_translate: There’s no time to gather our belongings!
label: there's no time to pack your things!

first_translate: get on your horses and move as fast as you can!
second_translate: Get on your horse and move as fast as you can!
label: find a horse and ride away as fast as you can!

hangle: 엑스트라 기사들은 비전투 인원에게 최대한 붙는다!
first_translate: knights, stay close to the non-combatants!
second_translate: Extra knights, stay close to the non-combatants!
label: soldiers and knights, try to stay as close to civilians as possible!

second_translate: Yes!
label: yes, ma'am!

first_translate: the darkness is approaching too quickly.
second_translate: The darkness is approaching too quickly.
label: the darkness is approaching too fast.

second_translate: What should I do…
label: what should I do...?

second_translate: Hey!
label: hey!

second_translate: I brought a horse.
label: I brought you a horse.

second_translate: Thanks!
label: thank you!

second_translate: Where's Siegren?
label: what about siegren?

first_translate: he’s helping people evacuate from the north.
second_translate: He’s helping with the evacuation in the north.
label: he's helping people escape in the north.

first_translate: if you see him, tell him to be careful!
second_translate: If you happen to meet him, tell him to be careful!
label: if you see him, tell him to take care of himself!

second_translate: Wait.
label: wait.

first_translate: you’re not thinking of staying here, are you?
second_translate: You're not planning to stay here, are you?
label: you're not thinking of staying behind, are you?

first_translate: you should evacuate to the forest too, my lady.
second_translate: You should evacuate to the forest as well, my lady.
label: you need to evacuate into the forest as fast as you can too, don’t you?

second_translate: I was worried.
label: don't worry about me.

second_translate: You should be the one to go back, Gunter!
label: take cover, gunter!

first_translate: staying behind is as good as suicide.
second_translate: Staying behind is as good as suicide.
label: staying behind is suicide.

second_translate: You really could die.
label: you could seriously end up dead.

hangle: 위험한 상황에서 윗대가리가 가장 먼저 내빼면,
first_translate: if the ones in charge run away first in a crisis,
second_translate: If the ones in charge run away first in a crisis,
label: if the one in command backs down in a dangerous situation,

first_translate: it will only cause more chaos.
second_translate: It will only make things more chaotic.
label: it will only create more chaos.

second_translate: I'm sorry.
label: I'm sorry,

hangle: 공작한테 부탁을 받은 게 있어서 말이다.
first_translate: but the duke asked me to do something.
second_translate: I received a request from the duke.
label: but I was given orders by the duke.

first_translate: he said, “if my daughter foolishly runs toward death,
second_translate: He said, "If my daughter foolishly throws herself into death,
label: "if my daughter rushes to her death like a fool,"

first_translate: save her no matter what it takes.”
second_translate: "Save her no matter what it takes."
label: "you must do whatever it takes to save her."

second_translate: That’s what he said.
label: that’s what he said.

first_translate: you can attack me if you want.
second_translate: Attack if you want.
label: fight me if you must,

second_translate: I'm confident I'll win.
label: but we  both know I'm gonna win.

second_translate: Well,
label: well,

second_translate: Don't worry too much.
label: don't worry about me too much.

second_translate: I’ll bring everyone back safely!
label: I'll make sure everyone I find is safe and sound!
